info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 23 at 11:03AM AST until October 23 at 1:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Penuelas and Ponce.
* WHEN...Until 100 PM AST.
* IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1102 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Penuelas, Tallaboa Alta, Coto Laurel, Aguilita, Capitanejo, Santo Domingo, Marueno, Tallaboa and Magas Arriba. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON
